item.title: Slow
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: Slow Travel “Two months in Mexico! What are you guys planning to do for that long?” I would usually shrug my shoulders and give a sheepish smile at the question whenever it came up. Yes, two months seems like a long time but once we started researching, it actually felt somewhat short. In the last 40 days that we have been in Mexico, we have come to know that 2 months is not even enough to scratch the surface of this huge country.
